field_options.description:
https://labs.mapbox.com/location-helper
find the spot, the zoom and the camera angle and paste the link here:
The text of the post goes here. Formatting tips: markdownguide.org

field_options.name: YouTube Video Link
field_options.description: Simply paste the link to the video from YouTube

field_options.name: User's Name
field_options.description: This will appear as the name for the author of the post (can be made up)

field_options.name: @handle
field_options.description: This will appear as the @username for the author of the post (can be made up)

field_options.name: Profile Image
field_options.description: This will appear as the profile image for the author of the post (can be made up)

field_options.name: Like Count
field_options.description: How many likes did this post get?

field_options.name: Comment Count
field_options.description: How many comments did this post get?

field_options.name: Twitter Link Title
field_options.description: (optional) For a tweet that includes a link, this would be the title of the link

field_options.name: Twitter Link Domain
field_options.description: (optional) For a tweet that includes a link, this would be the domain of the link

field_options.name: Title
field_options.description: Keep it short, it's only for the label
(optional) Choose tags that could fit this (the editors may add some extra ones)
(optional) Free notes that would appear about the post (credits and extra links for example)
(optional) Only if this is responding to or directly connected to another post or two, mark that here

field_options.name: Hi there, what's your name?
field_options.description: We will use it to credit you

field_options.name: What's your email address?
field_options.description: We won't publish it, but we need it to let you know when your post gets published

rows.field_5060:
This is a sample usage for a new chronomap in Chronomaps.org

1. Go into your Baserow admin page
2. Enter your name and details in the Authors table
3. Change the default settings in the Settings table
4. Use the contribute interface on your chronomap url to create posts
5. On the Content tab you can edit and publish both your own posts and those you may receive from others.

make it your own.

(True/False) False = disable option to contribute posts through the chronomap interface

rows.field_5060:
Hello!!

Please take the time to go through the existing posts in this chronomap and consider adding your own perspective on this storyline, inspired by the Back To The Future cinematic trilogy.
